content: knitted hat in drops fiesta piece is knitted bottom up in stocking stitch and rib with folding edge pattern fs-040 yarn group b #endgamehat **size** s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops fiesta from garnstudio 100-150 g colour 30 roasted almond **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops cable needle the technique magic loop can be used- you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 22 stitches in width and 30 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm
